verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a discussion by phone with Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] , [ARG0: President Trump] [ARGM-DIS: apparently] [V: justified] [ARG1: treating Canada as a national security threat] [ARGM-MNR: by mentioning its destruction of the White House during the War of 1812] . Trouble is , that was Britain .
